sn33.6-10:3.1: 6–10 Five Discourses on Not Seeing Form, etc.
sn33.6-10:4.2: Then the wanderer Vacchagotta said to the Buddha:
sn33.6-10:4.3: “What is the cause, Master Gotama, what is the reason why these various misconceptions arise in the world? …”
sn33.6-10:4.6: “Vaccha, it is because of not seeing form …
sn33.6-10:4.11: consciousness, its origin, its cessation, and the practice that leads to its cessation …”
